cast.name: 赫里尼克·罗斯汉 Hrithik Roshan
安妮娜·苏哈尼 Anjana Sukhani
普丽蒂·琴贾尼 Preeti Jhangiani
拉迪.阿格尼霍地里 Rati Agnihotri
赛义夫·阿里·汗 Saif Ali Khan

introduction: God works in strange ways. He makes us aware of the important people in our life - our parents, grandparents, friends. But the one person who will matter most in our life - the one we will love and cherish - He keeps secret from us. Only He knows! And only He decides when and how he will tell us. Who we will fall in love with? Who will fall in love with us? Na Tum Jaano Na Hum is the story of Akshay, Rahul and Esha. Three beautiful people dreaming of that one special person. Three young hearts with but one unfulfilled longing. Three souls that yearn to be touched by the magical wand of love. Three innocents in a fix, floundering on the complicated path of love. Only he knows the ending. Only he holds the key to their happiness. For only he knows.Na Tum Jaano Na Hum.这是个神奇古怪的恋爱方式。我们（有些事）应当让我们生活中的重要的人知道---我们的父母，祖父母，朋友。但是，在我们的生活中无论是谁总有我们无比珍惜的人，总是我们心中的秘密，只有自己知道！而且，只有他自己决定何时和如何告诉别人。我们爱上的人是谁？谁会爱上我们？Na Tum Jaano Na 就是阿克沙伊，拉胡尔和厄莎故事。一个特殊的人做着一个可爱的梦，却让三个年轻的心走向失落。爱神的魔杖决定着渴望得到爱的人的灵魂，三个无辜的人在复杂的路径上挣扎的爱如何修复，要想知道，只有到最后时刻。只有他们自己掌握着他们的幸福的钥匙。还是看看Na Tum Jaano Na Hum给出的（答案吧）。
